subject: Improve comparison feature with enhanced UX and accuracy
body:
Added comprehensive improvements to make model comparisons more accurate,
user-friendly, and actionable:

**Accuracy Improvements:**
- Added real CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost) inputs to all models
- Updated calculateUniversalMetrics to use actual CAC instead of estimates
- More accurate LTV:CAC ratios and profitability metrics

**User Experience Improvements:**
- Quick-start scenario templates (Early Stage SaaS, Enterprise SaaS, etc.)
- Smart input validation with actionable warnings before calculation
- Visual winner indicators with trophy icons and percentage differences
- Metric tooltips with explanations and industry benchmarks
- Executive summary panel with AI-generated recommendations
- Empty state handling for zero-revenue scenarios
- Enhanced input labels with contextual hints

**Technical Changes:**
- New constants: SCENARIO_TEMPLATES, METRIC_EXPLANATIONS
- New functions: validateModelInputs, displayValidationWarnings,
  getMetricInterpretation, renderExecutiveSummary, generateRecommendation
- Updated: calculateUniversalMetrics, renderUniversalMetrics,
  renderFamilyOverlayChart, renderSideBySideCharts
- CSS additions: winner-row styling, metric-card hover effects,
  validation warning animations

**Documentation:**
- Updated claude.md with detailed feature documentation
- Added technical architecture changes section
- Marked resolved open questions
